Sorcerer's Fury.name: Sorcerer's Fury
Sorcerer's Fury.flavor: A burst of energy erupts from your blade as you plunge it into your enemy, pushing away those near it.
Sorcerer's Fury.onHit: 3[W] + Strength force damage, and all creatures adjacent to the target are pushed 2 squares.

Arcane Overload.name: Arcane Overload
Arcane Overload.flavor: You charge your weapon with crackling arcane power. When your attack lands, the foe is awash in an explosion of withering energy, and the residual energy envelops your weapon.
Arcane Overload.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage and the target is weakened (save ends).
Arcane Overload.effect: The next time you hit with a weapon power before the end of your next turn, you can use a sorcerer at-will or encounter attack power as a free action that does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Resilient Denial.name: Resilient Denial
Resilient Denial.flavor: After you are hit by a particularly devastating attack, you channel your fury and attune your arcane energies to resist another such strike.
Resilient Denial.effect: Choose one of the following damage types: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder damage. You gain resist 15 against that damage type until the end of the encounter.
